text:
Lopez and Rodriguez have been hitting it off as a couple since they started dating back in March. Many fans think the two celebrities have finally met their match— and Rodriguez agrees. “Our kids get along really well, we’re both from New York, we’re both Latin, we’re both in our forties, we’re really enjoying life, but she really is one of the most impressive and smartest human beings I have ever met,” he told Extra.

And there’s a lot more that these two have in common than Rodriguez named. We’re listing all the similarities between J-Rod that makes their compalibility look solid as rock.
title: J.Lo and A-Rod Have More In Common Than You Think

og.title: J.Lo and A-Rod Have More In Common Than You Think
og.description: From Parisian vacations to family outings, J-Rod's busy lives aren't holding them back from enjoying their romance to the fullest. And although they have completely separate careers, these two celebs have a lot more in common than you initially thought, and we’ve rounded it all up.
